comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: She is mentioned at this event also: CHARITY HORSE SHOW.; 365 Entries Received for Exhibition at Durland's Next Week. Entries for the Spring Charity Horse Show, to be held next week at Durland's Riding Academy, closed yesterday. The names of over 365 horses had been received by the Secretary. Numerous others are expected, which were posted at the last moment yesterday. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=FA0F15FB395B17...
